abilities.description: User creates an enormous paw bubble between outstretched arms, compresses air repeatedly using paws, then launches it as a devastating bomb that creates a massive paw-shaped explosion capable of critically damaging ancient giants and destroying ice sheets.
abilities.firstUseContext: Used by Bartholomew Kuma against Little Oars Jr. during the Battle of Marineford, demonstrating the technique's full destructive power in large-scale warfare.

abilities.description: User can create nearly invisible strings sharp enough to cut through massive objects and body parts, demonstrated by severing an ancient giant's leg with precision.
abilities.firstUseContext: Donquixote Doflamingo severed Little Oars Jr.'s right leg during the Battle of Marineford, revealing the cutting ability of his string powers.

abilities.description: User creates shadow spears in the shape of horns that can impale opponents. Powerful enough to deliver a finishing blow to an ancient giant.
abilities.firstUseContext: Gecko Moria impaled Little Oars Jr. with Tsuno-Tokage to finish him off during the Battle of Marineford.
